comments:

Re-assigning defect to Scott Schneider, and changing component to 
executionharness (without confirming that to be the case, but just based on 
reading the description).

I was able to use the attached workspace and run the remote JUnit test suite
successfully.  It was deployed into my user's temp dir (%TEMP%) in Windows. 
This test was a Windows to Windows test.  Current TPTP 4.1 i1 testing has not
revealed any other reports of this use case failing.

Please re-try with the latest TPTP 4.1 i1 builds.
Verified in TPTP v4.1 (TPTP_v4_1_0_200509260100) on Sept. 26/05.
